title: "animated visuals"
output:
  pdf_document: default
---

```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
source("library_analysis.r")
library(gganimate)
library(gifski)
library(transformr)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
plot3_anim <- plot3 + geom_point() +
  transition_reveal(date_added) +
  ease_aes('linear')
animate(plot3_anim, renderer = gifski_renderer())
anim_save("plot3.gif")
```
